DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect combine treatment nutritional therapy physical exercise palliative cancer out-patients . The investigator hypothesize combine intervention consist increase energy- protein intake physical exercise level improve quality life ( QoL ) , functional clinical status .
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm metastatic lung cancer gastrointestinal cancer WHO performance status 0 , 1 2 Able walk least 100 meter independently without crutch walk frame assess treat physician basis patient 's history physical condition Receiving palliative treatment Enteral and/or parenteral nutrition within 1 month previous study participation History ileus within one month Known brain metastasis symptomatic bone metastasis Psychiatric disorder preclude understanding information trial related topic give informed consent . Any serious underlying medical condition could impair ability patient participate trial
